description:
Our North Houston location has a part-time opening!

Our Star Furniture showrooms are warm & friendly environments where our customers are greeted with customer-service in mind. The Service Assistant / Furniture Handler is one of the most important parts of our showroom!

These positions are fast-paced and are responsible for packaging, wrapping, loading, and arranging furniture in the showroom. You will work with our Visual Merchandisers to create an excellent environment and maintain the overall appearance and cleanliness of the showrooms. We have full-time positions with benefits and part-time positions with paid sick leave.

 

Our Service Assistants/Furniture Handlers are retail positions that require lifting, loading, unloading, and even some assembly. They are also in charge of cleaning the store (including bathrooms) and

Service Assistants must be reliable, dependable and MUST be able to lift 50 lbs. on a repetitive daily basis and work a flexible retail schedule including days, evenings, weekends, and holidays. Prior furniture and/or janitorial experience is a plus!

 

Store Location: 18107 North Fwy., Houston, TX 77090
